title: Decent Watch Face
summary: Attire is a Sober Single Hand watch face for Moto 360, LG G Watch R & others
description: Model NumberEF-A11CategoryDecentProduct description Attire is a Sober Single Hand watch face for all smart watches, a gentle sober touch makes it magnetic  (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features	Amazing Vintage Color	Wear / Phone Battery	Custom Ambient  Mode	Default Ambient Mode Pack	square & round watches supportAnd it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates, don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu) Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!Follow Us on Twitter !  http://www.twitter.com/elitewatchface  Like Us on Facebook !  http://www.facebook.com/elitewatchface Follow Us on Instagram !  https://www.instagram.com/elitewatchface Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/b/102084729733615241293It has following featuresFeatures: 	Amazing Vintage Color	Wear / Phone Battery	Show/Hide Battery	Custom Ambient  Mode	Default Ambient Mode Pack	square & round watches supportConfiguration: 	display wear or phone battery	hide battery	pick your favorite ambient modeFor Email support Contact us at  elitewatchface@gmail.comTip 1Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watchesTip 2✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Attire Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
descriptionHTML:
Model Number
EF-A11

Category
Decent

Product description

Attire is a Sober Single Hand watch face for all smart watches, a gentle sober touch makes it magnetic (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features

 Amazing Vintage Color
 Wear / Phone Battery
 Custom Ambient Mode
 Default Ambient Mode Pack
 square & round watches support


And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/elitewatchface
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/b/102084729733615241293
It has following features

Features:

 Amazing Vintage Color
 Wear / Phone Battery
 Show/Hide Battery
 Custom Ambient Mode
 Default Ambient Mode Pack
 square & round watches support
Configuration:
 display wear or phone battery
 hide battery
 pick your favorite ambient mode

For Email support Contact us at elitewatchface@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Attire Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
comments: It crashes regularly Immediately upon installing the watch face, it asks for a 5 star rating to "motivate them to improve" it.  How about improving it to deserve the 5 stars?
